name: Heroman
description:
The city of Futureville needs your help!

As the crime fighting superhero, Heroman, use your tools to get around the city destroying the evil robots trying to take over.

Use either your grapple hook, rocket boosters, machine pistol or grenade launcher to deal with the threat.

Only you can save us now.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Part of the https://itch.io/jam/vr-jam-2020 game jam!
